title: Lice Aren't Nice
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 263 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 620L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and O
description: Nobody likes lice, but it's important to understand how they grow and spread. These annoying little pests can cause all kinds of trouble and discomfort. Lice Aren't Nice dispels many of the common misconceptions about lice and informs students about prevention and treatment. The book can also be used to teach students how to retell and identify problems and solutions. The book and lesson are also available for levels L and O.
